services.name: nextcloud
entrypoint:
/entrypoint.sh apache2-foreground &
NEXTCLOUD_PID=$!

# Wait until Nextcloud config is created (first run) before applying trusted domains.
for _ in $(seq 1 120); do
  if [ -f /var/www/html/config/config.php ]; then
    break
  fi
  sleep 1
done

if [ -n "${NEXTCLOUD_TRUSTED_DOMAINS+x}" ] && [ -f /var/www/html/config/config.php ]; then
echo "Synchronizing trusted domains"
su -s /bin/sh -c "php /var/www/html/occ config:system:delete trusted_domains" www-data || true
set -f
NC_TRUSTED_DOMAIN_IDX=1
for DOMAIN in ${NEXTCLOUD_TRUSTED_DOMAINS}; do
  DOMAIN=$(echo "${DOMAIN}" | sed -e 's/^[[:space:]]*//' -e 's/[[:space:]]*$//')
  su -s /bin/sh -c "php /var/www/html/occ config:system:set trusted_domains ${NC_TRUSTED_DOMAIN_IDX} --value=\"${DOMAIN}\"" www-data
  NC_TRUSTED_DOMAIN_IDX=$((NC_TRUSTED_DOMAIN_IDX+1))
done
set +f
fi

wait "$$NEXTCLOUD_PID"
